name: com.PondoCash.www
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.update: cordova plugin save && cordova platform remove ios && cordova platform remove android && cordova platform add ios && cordova platform add android@9.0.0
scripts.updateIos: cordova plugin save && cordova platform remove ios && cordova platform add ios
scripts.updateAnd: cordova-hcp build && cordova plugin save && cordova platform remove android && cordova platform add android

author: Apache Cordova Team
